body:
Are we still having a UHC? Cause they said it would be after the update, but the update is out and I haven't seen an Avicus UHC.

Regards, Budah

title: Are we still having a UHC?

replies.body:
It's still in the works.
But it's not a priority at the moment.
replies.body_tagged:
It's still in the works.
But it's not a priority at the moment.

replies.body: Sorry but what does UHC stand for?
replies.body_tagged: Sorry but what does UHC stand for?

replies.body: Ultra Hard Core. It's Hard Core, but you don't have natural regeneration. And you have to kill everyone else to win.
replies.body_tagged: Ultra Hard Core. It's Hard Core, but you don't have natural regeneration. And you have to kill everyone else to win.

Thanks for helping me out :)
